name: Walt Disney Family Museum
description: The Walt Disney Family Museum in San Francisco's Presidio tells the story of Walt Disney's life through interactive galleries featuring original artwork, early drawings, films, music, and a stunning model of Disneyland.
fullDescription: The Walt Disney Family Museum in San Francisco's Presidio tells the story of Walt Disney's life through interactive galleries featuring original artwork, early drawings, films, music, and a stunning model of Disneyland.
whatTheyOffer:
- US Military/Dependents: Free general admission with ID
- Museums for All: Reduced admission for SF EBT/CalFresh/Medi-Cal holders
- Discount covers cardholder plus guests
- Students with ID: $25 admission
- Seniors (65+): $25 admission
- Children 6-17: $20 admission
- Children under 6: Free with adult
- Regular admission: $30 adults
howToGetIt: For military free admission, show valid military or dependent ID. For Museums for All, present your SF benefits card and proof of SF residency at the admissions desk.
address: 104 Montgomery Street, Presidio of San Francisco, CA 94129
keywords: Walt Disney Family Museum, Presidio, San Francisco, Disney, animation, military free, Disneyland model, cartoon history
